ygData.subject: Re: Guild
ygData.msgSnippet: Once the guild is approved through the chat server by a GM, there only has to be 1 person on each server to start the guild, because the general guild itself
ygData.messageBody:
Once the guild is approved through the chat server by a GM, there only has to
be 1 person on each server to start the guild, because the general guild
itself has already been approved. Now.. They might require that the Creator
of the guild in the chat start the guild off on each server... but it could
be switched over to a regular player.


BuhBye!
Andrew

In a message dated 7/23/99 9:08:22 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
redspieder@... writes:

<< so what you are saying is that once a quild is started all you have to
do is tell the guild gm that you want to carry it over? so once you got
the orginal 10 people on the first server you can have 1 person on each
other server sort of like recruters? or do there have to be 10 people
also on the other servers? well what ever the situation if we can get
it going on more than one server that would be great because i know that
there are other people on bristle bane server (my main server other than
the test server which i use soo little that it dont really count) which
btw i love what they are doing with rogues (no they are not turning on
their skills) now you can use both sneak and hide at the same time so
you can hide while you are moving at sneak speed!! they also upped the
effectiveness of back stab!! i cant wait until they start it up on the
regular servers!! >>
